11.2.1  The IRTC CDROM (Year Four)

The IRTC CDROM (Year Four) is a compilation of all entries made to the Internet Raytracing Competition during its fourth year of operation. As the IRTC is bi-monthly, this covers round #19 (May/June 1999) to round #24 (March/April 2000). It also includes rounds 7 through 10 (inclusive) of the IRTC Animations competition. As the animations competition runs every three months, this means that it includes 15 Apr 1999 - 15 Jul 1999, 15 Jul 1999 - 15 Oct 1999, 15 Oct 1999 - 15 Jan 2000, and 15 Jan 2000 - 15 Apr 2000.


Sample Images from The IRTC CDROM, Year Four

See »http://www.aussie.org/products/ for more information and to order from our secure server.
